short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple grid of handy web shortcuts. Changes your NewTab page to Agile as well as adding a quick access menu in the extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Agile gives you complete control over your (Home/New Tab) page. You can add your own background, add a border around the icons and also choose where and what shortcuts you want to appear. It loads lightning fast and new site shortcuts are being added all the time.
